title: In a Dark Time Buzzing Fly

content.question: The simile “My soul, like some heat-maddened summer fly, / Keeps buzzing at the sill” (lines 20-21) enhances the tense mood of the poem by

choices.label: depicting the dangerous hostility of nature
illustrating the confining effects of civilization

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain the function of a character changing or remaining unchanged.
